description_text:
I am inquiring about purchasing a pedal set from your website; the pricing
is listed in USD, and I am located in Ireland (EU). Could you please
specify your shipping origin?

conversations.body_text: 你好，Gavin Reidy，  根据您所需的踏板型号：PlusX 将于 6 月 15 日起从我们的德国仓库发货。Pro X Ultra 目前仅可从中国发货，且不含关税。VAM Pro 振动电机也从中国发货。
